name: DMod
description:
I was bored so I made my own GMod, there are: Zombies, MinecraftGun, Preset Gun Spawns Houses, The Everything gun Spawns Zombies and Boxes to build whatever you want, Character Customization: Box Head, Christmas hat, Black Top Hat, There is Multiplayer but its local so get hamachi to connect wit ppl that aren't on ur local wifi. There are Dimension Doors (2) One sends you to a white empty box, other one sends you to funky world.

WASD - movement

L Shift - Sprint

Space - jump

L Ctrl - Crouch

Tab - switch between Spawn Zombie/Box

1 - switch thru Pistol/ Everything Gun

2 - Preset Gun

R - respawn

esc (IN GAME) - char customization
